body: Whether errClosing is exported or not doesn't change the fact that the `net.Listener` interface (http://golang.org/pkg/net/#Listener) shipped in Go 1 and doesn't document any well-known error values from its `Close` method. We could expand the documentation at this point, but we'd have to do so very carefully with lax wording so we don't change the rules on people or the expectations retroactively.
